meanings.definition: The act of shooting a gun.
meanings.sent1: The gunfires echoed through the forest.
meanings.sent2: I heard the gunfires coming from the shooting range.
meanings.sent3: The movie scene was so intense, it felt like the gunfires were real.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like rapid gunfires in battle.
meanings.sent5: The gunfires in the distance signaled the start of the competition.

meanings.definition: The sound made by a gun when it is fired.
meanings.sent1: The sudden gunfires startled the birds in the trees.
meanings.sent2: The gunfires in the action movie were incredibly loud.
meanings.sent3: The old car backfired, making a noise similar to gunfires.
meanings.sent4: The gunfires of applause filled the auditorium after the performance.
meanings.sent5: The distant gunfires added to the tension in the air.
